ip: from Greek language iyan igpasabut the “peg-awe”. Te this document, it's written the concerning the pegpaawe of Master of people din neuripen there to inged named of Egypt. Migpamalehet this the Master iyan iya the true/correct God and greatest of all, because ware egpakabalabag kandin of igkeupii rin eggimuwen.

meta.ip: This document, insulatan of story concerning the neula-ula of descendants of Israel, and nabaad this of three: 1.) the peg-slave them there to Egypt, and the pegpaawe of Master them impepanguluwan din ki Moses in-anak-anak of one prinsisa; 2.) the pegpangabang of Master them of impanlupug e them of me Ihiptuhanen the egpeendiye of Bubungan Sinay, and imbehayan pad them of egkakeen and egkeinum there to bubungan; 3.) the showing of Master ki Moses there to Bubungan Sinay, and imbehayan din Moses of Law and miggimu ran of agreement; 4.) the ending, iyan the making of balungbalung intahuan of Kasabutan and the impaney-paney concerning the worshipping.
The pantek nahuhud iya of this document the concerning the neyimu of God of time impaawe din the neuripen people din and impasasindeg din them one nation due egkapallateng good keureme.

Moses the very important person here of story and chosen sikandin of God iyan egpangulu of people din from Egypt. The very nataheyi of people Sapulu Law, it's written iya here egbaseen there egkakita of chapter two pulu (20).

io1: The descendants of Israel impaawe there to Egypt

io2: a. The neuripen there to Egypt
b. The birth and pegkankanakan of Moses
c. The pegpakannekal pegpakig-apul of Moses and of Aarun of Paraun King of Egypt
d. The Peglihad of Messenger and the peg-awe of descendants of Israel there to Egypt

io1: The pegligkat there to Malalab Dahat going to Bubungan Sinay
The Law and the agreement of God
The balungbalung intahuan of Kasabutan and the impaney-paney concerning the worshipping
